reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 419/01: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - CONDOMINIUM DESCRIPTIONS - TOWN OF ST. MARYS
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY — CONDOMINIUM DESCRIPTIONS — TOWN OF ST. MARYS
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 419/01: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - CONDOMINIUM DESCRIPTIONS - TOWN OF ST. MARYS
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. The authority of the Minister under section 9 of the Condominium Act, 1998, or a predecessor of it, to approve or exempt a condominium description is delegated to the council of the Town of St. Marys with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule. O. Reg. 419/01, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The authority of the Minister under section 9 of the Condominium Act, 1998, or a predecessor of it, to approve or exempt a condominium description is delegated to the council of the Town of St. Marys with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule. O. Reg. 419/01, s. 1.

content.content: 2. (1) If the authority delegated under section 1 is in turn delegated to a committee of the council or to an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 419/01, s. 2 (1). (2) The delegation of authority set out in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that the condition set out in subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 419/01, s. 2 (2).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) If the authority delegated under section 1 is in turn delegated to a committee of the council or to an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 419/01, s. 2 (1).

(2) The delegation of authority set out in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that the condition set out in subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 419/01, s. 2 (2).

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 419/01, s. 3. SCHEDULE 31CD-95001 O. Reg. 419/01, Sched.
content.raw_html:
3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 419/01, s. 3.

SCHEDULE

31CD-95001

O. Reg. 419/01, Sched.
